name: AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy
desc: An enumeration of behaviors to apply when merging attributes.

items.name: case keepCurrent
items.desc: A policy to keep the stringâ€™s current attribute value when merging multiple sets of attributes.

items.name: case keepNew
items.desc: A policy to keep the newly-merged attribute value when merging multiple sets of attributes.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

items.name: static func == (AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy, AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two merge policies are equal.

items.name: static func != (AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy, AttributedString.AttributeMergePolicy) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two merge policies are not equal.
